documents.document: @clairenelson I read that quickly and thought "HA! I'M HILARIOUS TOO!!" then realised I probably yes, that's the joked myself...
@clairenelson she has to cut them off for him because he's not allowed to touch the scissors.
@BloggyDave I've had One Sweet Day by Mariah Carey and Boyz II Men in my head for two looonnnnng days now.
@zoesarahandrews Thanks. If it ever happens, you're invited (I don't eat meat but I'll let my friends know).
@zoesarahandrews TOP PICKS! I'd go Sparrow, budgie, Pigeon, coote, Canada goose, fucking Swan.
@zoesarahandrews which birds though?
@zoesarahandrews sorry for the bird in a bird in a bird style tweet....
@zoesarahandrews oooh I'll just stick to goldeneye on the n64 if that's okay?https://t.co/SR7sS2f8Pz
@zoesarahandrews did you see the thread with the theory it's a Russian disinformation account?
@invictusmaneo83 every year I'm the same. Did have one year where I filed it a couple of weeks early... What a time! 🎉 🎉 🎉 🎉 🎆
@rob_sell 9 years the Flappy Bat Brothers have been Facebook Friends (SIX YEARS AS THE FLAPPY BAT BROTHERS)! 🤡🤡🏓🏓🏓🏓🏓🏓🥂🍻🎂🎂🎂
@krussant I asked Stacey about ten years ago to make me a mix... This'll do!
@clairenelson I finished having therapy a few weeks ago after 15 months! It's probably the best thing I ever did.
@ava_assassin you obviously believed in your fight if they were you're own shoes. If they belong to anyone else you're just a big bully!
@ava_assassin whose shoes were they though?
Spent the evening editing photos and briefly forgot about everything going on in the world. Damn.
@hadyn79 ha, knowing that jumper exists has made mine! Have a good one, man!
@hadyn79 holy balls that's amazing!
@hadyn79 is that a fucking SPACE HARRIER T-SHIRT?
@NickMB let's hope not. I'll let you know in the next few months if it happens but I survive...
@lules89 ha! Thanks! Don't know why I insist on being super organised for shoots, but anything involving paperwork or workflow I'm a mess!
@lules89 I did once and I already had the hole punch. It's just awful though. Still a mess.
@lules89 I wish it made me more organised, it's had zero effect for five years! Next year will be different though. Yeeeeeeeeahnoitwon't.
Had a bloody great time in the darkroom last night. I look forward to having more bloody great times in the darkroom in future.
Hey @pollyth0mas! https://t.co/w9H1OLMepB
This dull ache in my side I've had the last two months... If I die, thanks for everything.
@TeaCupLucy I started enjoying it a bit more once I started really sharpening my big knife. Makes a massive difference. Still a ballache.
I don't know what this Jeremy Kyle programme is but it's not my tax return so I'd better keep watching it I guess.
[GIF of Bernard from Black Books doing his tax return]
I'm brilliant at the internet
@charmada @jonnyathan @pollyth0mas @Mullane45 better than being dragged into my boy talk...
@charmada @jonnyathan @pollyth0mas @Mullane45 Imagine what you can do with your life without someone who can't be arsed though.
@charmada @jonnyathan @pollyth0mas @Mullane45 send him that John Virgo video
@fishplums haven't read these but generally find mirror group awful for multiple shoddy/ heartless clickbait stories and the same content.
@nadinebphoto WHAT?!
Whenever I see the youth of today saying something is [any word here] af I still get confused that they're not talking about auto focus.
@charmada @jonnyathan @pollyth0mas well now I feel bad.
@jonnyathan @charmada @pollyth0mas Just got this message in from John Virgo. Good luck. https://t.co/qT0cQdH2sq
@GalactusHelmet too right. I always preferred the little red and white guy with the squarer head. When's THAT magazine out?
@GalactusHelmet and as if you'll be able to find it in the shops after 3 issues. Con bastards.
@GalactusHelmet have you seen the build your own r2d2 magazine? 2.99 first issue, 8.99 after that. R2D2 complete after 100 issues...
@lolapop1 Haha, but did it work? It might take a while but stick at it!
@lolapop1 also, I typed DOUBLE SOCKING not double shocking
@lolapop1 they're not so bad now. I just wish I'd listened to the physio when I was 16 and rested them!
@lolapop1 I found double shocking seemed to help a bit, keep them warm. Don't know the point at which mine started to get better but...
@lolapop1 my ankles were so bad at one point I could predict a cold snap with them. I had problems after doing ligaments for ~20 years.
@Webbo_init save it for the future though, for when you need it.
@Webbo_init do you follow Pete Souza on here or instagram? If you don't you're missing out on LOADS OF PICS.
@jonnyathan I have very much enjoyed my food from Ema Balti at your house near Ema Balti.
@jonnyathan is that Ema?
I finally watched Whiplash and can't believe nobody told me that one of the two dads off My Two Dads is in it playing a dad. Time wasted.
My new album "Smothered in VapoRub" available in all good record shops from Friday.
@charmada @pollyth0mas @TeaCupLucy @matthew_horwood Variety of textures, variety of flavours and hot and cold mix = perfect
@pollyth0mas @TeaCupLucy @charmada @matthew_horwood Noodle sarnies will do if necessary. Sausage roll sandwiches = ultimate comfort food.
@pollyth0mas @TeaCupLucy @charmada you've only had a supernoodles sandwich once? This is much better. More texture. And flavour. And Joy.
@GalactusHelmet Just realised I might have already mentioned it to you before, but it's properly opening this week https://t.co/X68y7wktrS
@charmada @TeaCupLucy unless you suffer from really bad heartburn an hour later which definitely isn't happening now.
@charmada @TeaCupLucy as long as there's plenty of butter, the sausage is moist and the pastry is a bit greasy, nothing can go wrong.
@TeaCupLucy @charmada Bread, pastry, melting butter and sausage are all the best, but this is greater than the sum of its parts.
@GalactusHelmet got a new place for us to eat next time you're round these parts!
@TeaCupLucy Oh my god it was the best thing I've had for ages!
I have a stinking cold and if you think I'm wrong for eating sausage roll sandwiches with loads of melting butter then you have a problem.
@taffy3rock Oh I don't know, I've heard people mention that but I rarely watch on telly unless it's like bullseye or something!
@taffy3rock definitely my style because I can't draw!
@taffy3rock well cats never are are they? No sense of urgency! It's not the real cat picture I did by the way... Nobody's seeing that.
FINISHED! And my old art teacher told me I was rubbish. 23 years later here I am drawing a cat! https://t.co/pKfL0zkoE3
ie NOT LIKE A CAT
This cat looks like it might be a YouTube make up artist/vlogger with 17 million subscribers.
Someone should have filmed this and put it on YouTube it'd be like that guy doing candyfloss like a big flower only really unimpressive.
Bloody hell! When did I become so great at drawing?!
Does anyone have any advice on how to draw a cat in a hurry? I mean I'm in a hurry, not the cat.
The Good Old Days is on BBC4 now. It's my absolute favourite programme on the telly.
@taffy3rock absolutely! Definitely need to look into getting some https://t.co/MVmshL4g4g second hand games!
@taffy3rock I'm fine with that. I actually bought it for my niece then decided she wouldn't use it. Fully intended to use it myself!
@taffy3rock I bought a 2DS for £15 last year and I've never opened it or bought any games for it.
@claireandrewz but you don't even like the Silencer!
Breakfast At Tiffany's or Don't Look Now?
Also, it doesn't matter how much noise there is outside when you've got this inside your head https://t.co/jlP1FR8KJB
Dunno why I'm tweeting about it. It doesn't bother me, I'm just putting off reading this self help book for the 5th time in a year.
Nothing like the sound of a generator and someone cutting through metal to soothe you to sleep, I'd imagine.
I bet everyone in the street is really happy about whatever works are going on at the entrance of Eastern High at 00:15.
@zoesarahandrews Ah that's a shame! Yes, I'll be the one cowering in a pool of sweat!
@pollyth0mas UNLIKE KARATE KID 2, KARATE KID 3 AND ALL THE CHRISTMAS FILMS I'VE RECORDED!
@pollyth0mas I saw it and didn't get what the fuss was about. I thought it was okay, I probably wouldn't watch it if it was on telly.
@zoesarahandrews does that mean you won't be at the darts? Noooooooooooo!
@pollyth0mas I seem to be the only person in the world absolutely not bothered by this film!
@LollyGee Haha! I must have another one!x
@LollyGee I went in the middle of a bit of a breakdown and it is a wonderful place. Happiest of New Years to you too!
@LollyGee that looked amazing! I want to go back to Berlin. Oh God Oh God Oh God. Hi.
I can't keep watching BBC News if they're going to continue with these mannequin challenge type reports!
Finally getting in the Christmas spirit. Woken up with Little Donkey going around in my head. Oh well, time to blow the dust off my camera.
Finally watched Pride. Fantastic film. I say that with confidence as today I also watched Inbetweeners 2, which is a steaming pile of shit.
Annual watch of Jim Valvano's Cutting Down the Nets finished. Great inspiration and a funny, likeable character. https://t.co/Tg5JyMYoMv
My diet the last week has been 94% POM-BEAR.
Just looked at my goals list for 2016... Made 3 out of 15, which is 3 more than 2015 when I didn't make a list! I'd call that a success!
Have the best 2017 everyone. Be amazing.
@GalactusHelmet I wonder who ACTUALLY is though...
@GalactusHelmet the one where Mccrirrick anything makes me cross!
@GalactusHelmet ah balls, last year I watched nearly 8 hours of bullseye straight for new year. Always hated Christmas specials though!
